price: 115. Dan milik Allah timur dan barat. Ke mana pun kamu menghadap di sanalah wajah Allah. Sungguh, Allah Mahaluas, Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقُ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبُۚ فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi al-mashriqu wal-maghribu fa-aynamā tuwallū fathamma wajhu al-lahi inna al-laha wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
